resources.string: This **Library** activity displays the users saved playlists and songs, while also providing an interface for searching through their own library as well as for new songs. \nI would like to implement a search interface into the app bar, but have used a simple SearchView here in the library for now. \nThe most pressing challenge is how to pull the list of songs and playlists from a database and generate the necessary views. The **ListView** looks the most promising in this regard.
